title: FinSight – Personal Finance Coach
goal: Offer budgeting, expense tracking, and savings predictions with behavioral nudges.
why_it_matters: Most students manage money reactively instead of planning proactively.
data: User transaction CSV or mock spending data.
ai: Time-series forecasting (Prophet) to predict monthly balances.
workflow: Predict future spending and saving potential.
outcome: Applied forecasting + UX-first financial AI example.
